title: Rachel McAdams tucks a bottle of wine into Celine Dion bag as she and her mom pick up a few goodies
text:
She and her mom are particularly close.

And on Thursday evening, Rachel McAdams was spotted with Sandra picking up a few groceries in Los Angeles.

The 40-year-old actress slipped a bottle of wine into a Celine Dion tote bag as they stood outside a store.

Shopping run: Rachel McAdams was spotted with her mom Sandra picking up a few goodies, including a bottle of wine that she slipped into her Celine Dion bag, in Los Angeles on Thursday

Rachel wore a blue and white striped blouse, black jeans, and studded sandals on a day when the temperature hit 80F.

The Canadian left her long blonde wavy hair to cascade over her shoulders and covered her eyes with a large pair of shades.

Her mom Sandra, a red-head, donned a grey T-shirt, knee-length denim shorts and Nike sneakers.

Casual comfort: The pair were lightly dressed on a day when the temperature hit 80F

For once, the couple were out without Rachel's 18-month-old son, whom she shares with her beau of two years, writer Jamie Linden, 39.

They welcomed the tot in April 2018 and have yet to reveal his name, in an attempt to keep his life as private as possible.

In 2018 she said she was more than happy to welcome a child into her life.

Beautiful blonde: The 40-year-old actress stopped to talk to a fan who approached her

And baby makes four: Rachel and her beau of two years, writer Jamie Linden, 39, were seen out with Sandra pushing their 18-month-old tot in a stroller last month

'[People say] your life is not your own any more,' McAdams explained. 'But I had 39 years of me, I was sick of me, I was so happy to put the focus on some other person. I waited a long time [for motherhood].'

Meanwhile, the Canadian is presently filming her comedy Eurovision, based on the Europe-wide song contest of the same name.

She plays Sigrit Ericksdottir along with Will Ferrell, 52, as Lars Erickssong who are given the opportunity to represent Iceland at the world's biggest song competition.

It also features Pierce Brosnan, 66, Dan Stevens, 37, and Demi Lovato, 27.

Eurovision is expected to be released on Netflix next year.
description: The 40-year-old Canadian actress was spotted out with Sandra McAdams in Los Angeles on a hot Thursday. She will next be seen in Netflix comedy Eurovision, due out next year.
